data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/mGiSArFhUhdPxeNAC6GWSa2REws.jpg","id":642949,"title":"A Christmas Movie Christmas","original_title":"A Christmas Movie Christmas","overview":"Eve is a Christmas movie fanatic and dreams of having a movie-perfect Christmas with a movie-perfect boyfriend. On Christmas Eve, when Eve and her cynical sister Lacy make wishes to Santa, they wake up in Christmas Town and find themselves trapped inside a Christmas movie where they are the stars. But when things start to go wrong, and Eve's knowledge of all things Christmas movie fails to fix things, Eve and Lacy try to find a way out of the picture-perfect Christmas and back to reality.","poster_path":"/5H9Xvprh7PU1rFTGm2ZcnbaeP7s.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10749,10770,14],"popularity":5.745,"release_date":"2019-10-27","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":40},{"backdrop_path":"/2LmRs5tgA5tGIZUKzB6W6LS4lng.jpg","id":550025,"title":"Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa","original_title":"Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa","overview":"Lisa's trip home to Evergreen for the holidays finds her shepherding an effort to save the town's beloved general store, fulfilling the wishes of a Christmas past and finding a romance full of Christmas magic.","poster_path":"/c7sbYi97TdjSPwUboF802yWidPP.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10751,10749,10770],"popularity":7.879,"release_date":"2018-11-18","video":false,"vote_average":6.922,"vote_count":51},{"backdrop_path":"/miuRDcFwkml4S2jNpXnYA6rA4ye.jpg","id":559337,"title":"A Christmas Switch","original_title":"A Christmas Switch","overview":"Christmas works its magic in this body-switching holiday tale about two very different moms who find that help is where you least expect it, and most need it. When struggling singer Audrey and wealthy record executive Julia collide at the mall, they wake up in each other’s lives the next morning. Audrey finds that, though Julia’s life is full of luxury, she’s missing the chance to connect with her family in any real way while Julia finds that, though she gets plenty of family time, Audrey can’t say no to anyone giving her no time for herself. As Christmas looms closer, the two women rush to figure out how to both help each other and switch back before they miss Christmas morning with their own families!","poster_path":"/g71k3gbOUBL5PXhMwOhoTHrRXE4.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,10770,18,10751],"popularity":6.684,"release_date":"2018-11-04","video":false,"vote_average":6.1,"vote_count":30},{"backdrop_path":"/2uUxzE7II3verbbXyirh48VQpoz.jpg","id":728204,"title":"Romance on the Menu","original_title":"Romance on the Menu","overview":"New York restaurateur Caroline inherits a café in Lemon Myrtle Cove, Australia. Nell was hurt when Emmett stood her up for a dinner date and then disappeared from New York without any explanation.
